item.description:
The pipes are clogged. What to do? Call the plumber, that's who! Weird and scary monsters are destroying water pipes that are needed to keep everything clean. Better grab a plunger and hop on it to stop the monsters from terrorizing the plumbing system. Be careful! Don't go down the wrong pipe or else you will be lost forever. Will the monsters make a mess of everything or will the plumbers be sitting triumphantly on their thrones? Get your NERF blasters ready for a two hour battle event for ages 6 and up.

 

 

Visit www.guardup.net to pre-register:   $15/member, $20/nonmember 

Or Call ahead pre-registration (781) 270-4800: $17/member, $22/nonmember

At the door registration: $20/member, $25/nonmember
item.name: Buddy Night with NERF: Plumbing Problems
